text: A cordial discussion was held between the Secretary and Colonel Thiaw during the meeting. Mementos were also exchanged during the occasion.Deputy Military Liaison Officer of the MoD Brig Nevil Weerasinghe was also present at the occasion.The Defense Advisor of the Senegalese Embassy accredited to New Delhi and Sri Lanka, Colonel Malick Thiaw made a call on to Defense Secretary Kapila Waidyaratne PC at the ministry on Wednesday (2nd Aug.). A cordial discussion was held between the Secretary and Colonel Thiaw during the meeting. Mementos were also exchanged during the occasion.Deputy Military Liaison Officer of the MoD Brig Nevil Weerasinghe was also present at the occasion.
title: Senegalese Defense Advisor meets Defense Secretary
